content.detailedDescription: Multiple objects with long trains looked like something breaking up upon entry to the atmosphere. as pieces broke away they appeared to burn up.
content.summary: Looked like something breaking up upon atmosphere entry

content.detailedDescription:
Two lights in the sky at first i thought they were planes but soon realized that they were not they had no sound or no windows it was lower than airplanes at one time and is
i watched it for about an hour and it disappears and ten minutes later i see it again but only for two seconds and it disappears again after that i spotted the ufo about as high as the stars but a little lower it seems as if the object shot upwards and slowed down.
content.summary: Very strange

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, and our 12 year old grandson left bowling lanes at 10:00 p.M. 6/28/15 in erwin, nc.  they noticed a triangle shaped object with lights in the sky.  when my husband sped up on the road, the object either went just as fast or passed him and waited.  when he slowed down, the object slowed down.  my husband did this on purpose to see if the object was conscious of his movements.  this was all on route 421 heading south from erwin, nc to lillington, nc.  

when he stopped at a mcdonald's in lillington, nc, the object stopped.  when he came out of mcdonald's the object was hovering over the car dealership across the street (which is well lit).  as he progressed south through lillington, and then southwest on route 27 from lillington toward sanford/broadway, nc, object started following him again.  object disappeared about 1/2 way down route 27 between lillington and our home.  

grandson has a photo and a video but we do not know how to upload it from my grandson's device. we live about 20-25 minutes from ft. bragg/pope air force base and about 1/2 hour from simmons army air force base.  we see planes and helicopters all the time.  this was not a plane nor a helicopter.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with lights

content.detailedDescription: Roomate call3d me to see double bright lites 280 degrees west. 90 degrees on horiz  15 min was gone  went out to see several times  departure sudden w t h
content.summary: 2 bright planet like lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the end of my driveway around 9-10 pm talking to my neighborhood friend who lived directly across the street from me. he was a few years older than me. i believe the year 1990, or 1991. 
 
we were standing by the street talking like we had many times before, and he looked up and said what is that – pointing into the sky. i looked where he was pointing and we saw a disk/saucer shaped ufo hovering above the next door neighbor’s house. this ufo was quietly hovering about 300 feet off the ground about the tree tops. it had changing lights blinking around the outside shape of it – giving it the outline of a saucer shape. 

we said to one another what’s that? and stared at it for a short time, and then we got scared and decided to run home. i ran home and my parents said i had eyes the size of grapes from what i saw. my dad decided to call the fire department and ask if anybody else had reported seeing a ufo around that same time. the dispatch reported nobody had seen a ufo that they were aware of.
content.summary: Round disk/saucer shaped ufo with blinking lights around the edge -stationary no sound

content.detailedDescription: We were at my house and it was thunder storm and we seen a big bright light coming real slow than light went way and it stayed in that one spot and then went real fast in to the sky with bright orb behide it
content.summary: Big and round and it was a shape of circle moving slow then went super fast with one orb behind it

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling e on i-94 in brookfield, wi mile marker 300 on 6/28/15 at 8:53pm when i observed 12 orange red fireballs at a high rate of speed traveling from se to nw. 3 were high in a hockey stick pattern, the other 9 were at treetop level and flew over my car. a police car made a u turn on the freeway in front of me while rolling down his window. i turned around at moorland road but the lights and the police car was nowhere to be found. i had a camera and video camera in my car unfortunate i could not get them out fast enough. seemed like as soon as i turned my camera on, they went faster and flew right over my car. thanks for the work you do!
content.summary: I was traveling e on i-94 in brookfield, wi on 6/28/15 at 8:53pm when i observed 12 orange red fireballs at a high rate of speed from se to nw.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i and 4 other friends were sitting on a hill at coindre hall in huntington ny. when all of a sudden we notices a very large craft flying overhead silently and slowly with a cloud or something under it hiding it from view. however, i do seam to remember seeing a black object above the cloud. the object stopped when it got over huntington harbor at the opening to huntington bay. we then ran down the hill after it and stopped at the end of the dock near the boat house. i remember someone started yelling take me take me. the dock is about 100 ft or so long and we were at the end. we all stood there not talking or moving at all. we were all just staring at the object. the object now had white light columns that seamed to shine down around the perimeter of the object. in the center was a black hole that had a white beam of light that would shine down on the land scan around and go back up. all around the black hole center  radiating out to the column lights was a gas or electricity that was in the clouds or mist that was under the craft. the radiating gas or electricity was colorful and not like anything i have ever seen. there was also a humming noise in the background. every time the beam of light would come down it would scan around and then retract back up into the black hole in the bottom center of the craft. the beam of light did not act like light as we know it. it would come down as if it had an end to it not like light that would keep shining until it hit a solid object. it would descend down scan around and then retract back up getting closer and closer to us every time it came down. i remember thinking that the beam was getting close and feeling a fear come over me. i thought its getting really close now. then all of a sudden it felt as if i had just awoken from a dream, the beam was gone, i columns were gone the sound was getting lower. everything was getting farther up into the sky when the object just took off at a tremendous speed straight up into space. i felt a gust of worm wind in my face followed by wind from behind and it was gone. we all looked around at each  other and said things like omg did you just see that, what was that, in tired, what time is it etc, etc. i remember the whole event felt as if it was only about 15 minutes or so. however, it was 3:00am. although the event only felt like 15 minutes it had actually been 4 hours. 

 a few days after the event happened i remember having a dream that i was in a craft looking out a window at an assortment of different looking crafts. i remember that they all looked very different from each other and not like any craft i have ever seen. 

  i have always wanted to get hypnosis to try to see what actually happened during those hours that felt like minutes. however, i don't know if i really do want to know what happened. maybe its something that i will not want to remember. however, i have been getting more curious lately.
content.summary: Craft slowly went overhead, stopped at water, we went down to it, missing time fear,sound, craft shot into sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife noticed two lights very bright compared to stars to the west. slowly they lowered. followed by lots of aircraft i can not identify in the area. very fast, lights, no noise at all. the aircraft if planes, should have made noise. covering a lot of area in a small amount of time.
 i tried to flash a small light towards the bright object. it eventually went below the tree line. nothing to crazy happened. these lights are not normally there. it was not a plane. however, several other crafts, whether planes or choppers were circling the area..
i did take pics.
content.summary: Weird bright gold lights, followed by extremely fast aircrafts in area. tried taking pics and video

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing frisbee with my son, so looking up towards the sky, in a s, sw direction at the time, when i noticed a bright circular or round object in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane and the sun's reflection off it, since it was around 3 pm, and i was looking in a direction that is a common flight path over the central us, in ne. but then i noticed that it moved very little. it then moved behind some thin clouds and i lost sight of it. i then told my son to come over and try to see what i was seeing. i looked up again and it had reappeared and was in a new position, just south of its last position. i really noticed then that its brightness was significantly more than the reflection of a plane, well over a mile up, and the shape was more like an orb, circular than anything. it hovered very little in that position, then just disappeared from view.
i at once felt very enthused that i had possibly seen something i always wanted to see. this is why i am reporting it, as the event was definitely an anomaly, not the usual view of a jet going overhead. it was also not a helicopter by the unusual flight path, if you call it that. the whole account lasted only 30 seconds i guess. my son didn't arrive at my position in time to see anything.
content.summary: Noticed round bright light which moved slightly, hovered, then disppeared, then reappeared  in slightly diff location

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was seated in the front passenger-side of an suv. 
- i was taking pictures with cameras and my droid turbo 21mp mobile. i tool the 2 shots with the mobile as both my canon and panasonic lumix somehow weren't functioning properly (batts).

2) i didn't notice it at first as i was shooting the mountains and the trees. i noticed it after i was checking the results.

3) i thought it was a blimp, but because of the color, i then thought that it might not have been one.

4) the object was just still and hovering above the treeline. no sounds and no lights.

5) i was shocked, amazed and amused.

6) i never saw it when i was shooting pictures. i only noticed it when i checked my mobile the following morning.
content.summary: Anomalous shape hovering above treeline

content.detailedDescription: Taken in hot springs arkansas on june 28th at 10:08 a.M. noticed the object in my picture tonight as i was going thru them.
content.summary: Just noticed it looking at my pictures tonight

content.detailedDescription:
I am bringing this up in the event if someone has had any type of similar situation.  can't say what it was but thought perhaps this could be helpful if there has been.

1. first in bedroom of home.  then kitchen for husband.  bedroom and then bathroom for wife.  daughter age 12 observed from upstairs bedroom.

2. horrendous sound of coyotes like we have never heard in 19 years of living in the woods on the north side of holland, michigan which woke all three of us up from sleeping.  we had the windows open as we usually do.  in all these years i have only seen a coyote twice during the day but often hear them at night in the distance.

3. had no idea what it was. 

4 & 6. after we had been awakened buy the coyotes, i sat on the bed and looked out of the bedroom window while sitting on the bed which faces north.  to my right (east) i observed blinking lights far off in the distance through the woods.  (there was never any sounds after we had heard the coyote's originally.)  it was a very dark night.  i had thought of turning the flood lights on in the backyard but my wife said not to do it.

the lights then got closer and several dashed extremely fast through the woods.  the woods to the east and north in our area are parallel tall pine trees planted during the depression times.  west is much more dense and hard to get through.  they continued off to the west.  a final light turned out of the woods from the east over a corner of the basketball court and down the drive westward much closer to the bedroom window.

i ran to the kitchen on the other side of the house to see if i could see anything more.  westward i saw nothing.  to the southwest i saw a flashing light in the distance far enough out that i presumed in was on 160th.  then in an instant it was in our flower garden in front of the kitchen window.  to move to the kitchen window it would have to pass through thicker random woods which would be hard for anything on foot to do.  i felt like it knew i was looking that way and came towards me.  then it moved to my right and out of view after standing still for 15 seconds in front of the kitchen window.

meanwhile, my wife was looking out of the bathroom window eastward into our backyard.  a light moved toward the tree and then down our driveway westward.  she also thought i had run outside because she thought she saw a bare torso of a man in the backyard which she thought was me who had gone out to see.  later she did not see this and it certainly was not me.

5. evidentially my teeth had been chattering because my wife told me they were.  my wife did not what to turn the lights on outside because she did not know what was going on.  for two months she would not take the dog out at night.  it can be very dark here at night and we still do not like to walk around in the darkness at night.

my daughter we did not discuss this with and we did not know she witnessed this until just recently.  she is now age 16.  she saw the lights and thought she saw something in the back yard.  her bedroom is directly above ours with windows facing east and north.

here is where a possible explanation comes in.  a bit later it was not as dark and there was a hound dog that was walking outside our bedroom window with a red light flashing light. (not a white flashing light as we had seen before) even weirder is he started clawing at the side of our house off to the side of the bedroom window and howling.   

so, maybe it was just a pack of dogs all wearing flashing lights running through the woods in the middle of nowhere making no noise.  conceivable, but i have never seen a pack of dogs out here in 19 years.  one occasionally during the day.  nor have i seen any dog around here with a flashing light other than the hound dog.  to me these lights seemed very bright and made no sound even though the windows had been open.  the speed they made it through the woods i have also never seen any animal do out here.  and why no noise?  i can even hear squirrels running through the woods and deer certainly make a noise.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silent lights dashing through the woods

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished class and was driving, on my way home from college. i was in traffic on 117th avenue between miller drive and bird road. miami is a crowded place but absolutely no one ever looks at the sky. that particular week some of my friends claimed to have seen ufo's and i wanted to see a ufo as well. somehow while sitting in traffic bored, i thought if i stuck my head out the window i might just get lucky. i expected to find nothing but to my surprise i saw something fly in a very strange pattern in the sky. it was just a perfect 90 degree from the sky, and i stared at it as much as i could and hoped others would see it too but they probably just thought i was weird. an entire intersection filled with traffic and no one saw it except for me. i used to sit on my roof every week to star gaze so i know everything man made that flies in the air. i've seen shooting stars, satellites, helicopters- i can spot an airplane from miles away and easily identify it and tell you if it's an airplane or not (99% of the time it is a boring airplane). i am joining the military and had my vision tested. i have 20/20 vision but despite how ridiculous it sounds to me, and no matter how hard i try to not believe ufos sometimes, to just be blissfully ignorant like everyone else, i cant deny that what i saw was not man made. it was a legitimate flying object and it moved sporadically and zig zagged, and then stopped immediately and floated above the clouds in a straight line. it looked like a ball of light a little bigger than a star but it was not a star. i could tell because the way it gave off light was different. airplane lights for instance give off an earthly glow. this ufo did not have any light waves extending from it. it was a perfect ball of light. and after a few seconds of watching it i became excited, but before the street light could even turn green the ufo flashed and zipped away into the night sky. my guess is that it went to space or something. that thing was insanely fast. i shouted in excitement driving back home. i told people but they either didnt believe me or didnt care. my own family didnt believe me. my sister said what i saw was a helicopter...Ridiculous. i even mentioned it in a presentation in school and i was laughed at but im still respected for being an intelligent person so i didnt care what they thought of me. that ufo was impossibly fast and it was not natural or as astronomers say a "scientific occurrence" or some baloney that they think non scientists just arent smart enough to realize. i know my brain did not fool me. i am no fool. i dont know what it was but my best guess is that it was some type of space craft. i know the ufo chose to remain at that high altitude because miami is a large city and the ufo was prone to witnesses. why it made a pit stop on my sky i have no idea. ufos seem to behave in irrational ways from my point of view. but now i know why not everyone sees ufo's. it's extremely easy to miss sight of them if you're not paying attention!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
first observed at 8:30pm stationary in the night sky to the northwest of my location. the solid white lights formed the 3 points of a triangle at first. the faint outline of a structure between the points was barely visible. as i continued to watch the lights at the points of the triangle all turned off, the point at first, and then the others in sequence. the object then proceeded to move slowly to the northwest without sound. there appeared to be at one point a large dark hole in the center of the object. i observed it for in excess of 45 minutes as it slowly moved away.  
   as it moved away, a second, larger, similarly triangular object was observed, remaining stationary, to the northeast. i continued to observe it for an additional 30 minutes, during which it never moved. the lights on this object blinked alternately red to white and back with a blue light every 3rd or 4th pulse. it appeared to be up to 15 times larger than the first object observed.
   digital photographs were taken, but nothing appears on the lcd screen. i will have them developed and see if anything is on them.
content.summary: Huge triangle with a black hole in center

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of seeing these objects i was applying to join the raf, the week previously i had been to my third interview/induction meeting. as part of this process i had received a booklet containing all uk raf hardware including the planes and helicopters used as well as weaponry used, with the instructions to learn all the hardware available as we would be tested on this information. after my third interview i was taken aside and informed that due to previous bouts of hay fever i would be unable to continue the process at that time, however i could reapply one year down the line. i still have the letter i received somewhere which would allow me to give an exact date of the sighting. i include this information for two reasons, firstly because at this time i was required to know and identify all types of military aircraft and secondly because i was disappointed by the decision and was outside in the back garden having a cigarette whilst mulling over my options.
it was around 1:30 am and i was sitting on the bench in the back garden contemplating my next move. i remember hearing a faint buzzing sound which i can best describe as the sound an air conditioning system would make. this noise didn't break my train of thought as i remember hearing it and without really thinking about it, attributing it to the nearby motorway. after maybe 20-30 secs of it continuing, my thoughts changed to realising that was not the sound of the motorway, i had never heard anything like it before or since. at this point i looked up and slightly to my right but essentially directly above me i saw three bright white lights in the shape of an equilateral triangle, upon closer inspection i could make out the body of the vehicle which joined the lights. the body was a matt black colour which could be made out against the slightly lighter night sky. as the object moved it blocked out the stars that were in my line of vision. at this point i also saw two orange orbs following the triangular object, these were offset but following directly behind the triangular object, as the three objects flew directly above me the two orbs crossed over, switched position and carried on on the same trajectory. i watched as the objects passed directly overhead until they went out of vision over my house, at this point i ran inside and watched from the living room window as they continued on the same flight path until they were out of sight. the whole incident was over in around 3-4 minutes.
content.summary: Black solid triangular object moving slowly over my house with two orange orbs following

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking our dog for a walk through bridgton. as we entered the parking lot of the movie theater we noticed a large moving orb in the sky, it was bigger and brighter than any star in the sky. it was moving diagonally from the horizon, and  when it was about 6 inches above the horizon it changed direction and began moving horizontally, parallel to the treetops. it moved faster at this point, slowly turned yellow/orange and grew smaller and smaller until it disappeared. this is not the first time we have seen a craft of this type, we have seen these multiple times before; sometimes in pairs, or moving/changing direction more dramatically.
content.summary: White orb, brighter and bigger than a star, flies straight, changes direction then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come out the building door and i heard a humming sound kind of far, then i looked up and i saw it. it stayed for maybe 2 minutes and then like a rocket straight up and disappeared.
please note this was the last viewing i had, the first time i was 12 years old. i have had a total of 4 viewings.
content.summary: Dark maybe black triangle 4 lights 1 on each corner and 1 in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: Smoking a cigarette i noticed something moving fast with an extremely large trail that got really bright and then the trail turned into a mushroom and shot out what looked like a little white star.  the object that emerged out of the trail was moving way to fast for anything man made that i know of.  also there was no loud boom.  there was an extremely odd humming when i first walked outside, it was a frequency that i had never heard before.
content.summary: Looked like a rocket breaking sound barrier

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of march 20th, my wife and i had an incredible ufo sighting that i posted about here.

last night we had another ufo sighting. same part of the sky - south of long beach, ca over the pacific.

at about 10:05 pm, i went outside to sky-gaze as i often do. it was fairly overcast. the moon, which sat high in the wsw sky, was shrouded by the low clouds and cast a diffuse glow. a couple of minutes later, due south and about 30 degrees above the horizon, another diffuse light appeared behind the clouds. it was white and looked similar to how the moon looked, but not as diffuse. it gradually grew brighter, and as it did, two other similar looking diffuse white circles of light appeared, forming an equilateral triangle. they were all about a third to half the diameter of a full moon. 

at this point i yelled for my wife, called her on my cell, and knocked on the pane glass living room window to get her attention. she came running out with her i-phone and saw the triangular formation just before it faded out. as those three lights faded out, a brighter light appeared in between where the other three lights were, and grew brighter, casting a bright glow against the surrounding clouds. we could make out a fairly well-defined bright star-like light at the center and the surrounding glow it cast was about three-quarters the diameter of a full moon. she managed to catch that final light on video before it faded about 30 seconds later. 

all of these lights were perfectly stationary.

i stayed out for another hour, but i didn't see any more.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle of diffuse, stationary white lights off coast

content.detailedDescription: Twenty minutes previous to the sighting, i was out on my back deck which faces west. i was out there summoning as i do every other day or so. once again i saw nothing. i went into the house and noticed a missed call from my brother.. i called we spoke briefly .. only 2 minutes or so. we hung up and i went over to the couch in our living room on the first floor of the home and i sat down. as i'm waiting for everything to load up so that i could play playstation boxing, something told me to look out towards the window in the foyer area of the house, it's one of the smallest viewing windows on the property and is half covered by a diamond shaped curtain. when i looked up, i noticed a very brilliant violet colored light moving smoothly through the sky from the south, moving in our direction which would be a direct north heading. i called my wife erin from upstairs so that she could see what i was seeing. it didn't take long, as the window is located at the bottom of the stairs. her reaction was similar to mine.. basically saying "wtf?" again and again. at this time, the object makes a smooth transition to a western heading while maintaining what appears to be the same slow steady speed. i start saying to my wife "i've gotta go out back and see this thing.. wtf is it? i thought she would be hot on my heels but as i got to the back door i looked back for her and she wasn't there. she had stopped off for the video recorder. when i first noticed it, i thought maybe a ufo? and started yelling for my wife to come quick before it's gone.  the actions observed by myself were, very brilliant violet lights most beautiful clean looking light i've ever seen there was no sound whatsoever. it moved with ease, no effort.. it's light seemed to go on and off randomly.I observed this object vanish only to reappear in the blink of an eye, but in a different location.. i saw it just above the trees and it looked like  a globe with a light in it. some other things it did include.. flying forward then backward.. it changed speeds and went dark but was still viewable. one thing in particular though, was the fact that i was filming in (black and white mode). there is a shot when u can actually see violet or red when the craft rotates.. it's earlier in the video as it moves above the trees furthest to the right. when i saw it i was excited and anxious. i went to the back to step out for a better look and that's just what i got.. so good of a clear look that i didn't immediately go outside, i kind of got scared and froze, hanging half in half out of the deck door until erin approached from behind with the camera and i wasn't alone, is when i stepped out and started to shoot. i had a range of emotions during and after. after i felt like i wanted more contact, felt almost certain there would be and more regularly. i felt angry, because i know we are not being told the truth. i felt that we saw a ufo or something supernatural. i lost sight of it because it juked me outta my shoes, just saying that it moved in way as to cause me to lose sight of it. as i'm filming the last couple seconds of footage, i observe the object get kind of fat and blurry and then it was gone. since then i've watched the video and now know what happened. it made a move to the right as if it was gong to fly out view, so i'm thinking it's gone, but no, it just vanished for a second then reappeared in the same spot but reversing direction and going left.. i couldn't keep up.. it lost me
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sphrical, silent and rotating. vanishes and appears in a second but somewhere further away or just different.

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked out onto the front porch when i saw a object hovering over the powerlines approximately 1 mile away. at first i thought it was a hot air balloon. i ran into the house and grabbed my binoculars and i watched it float in mid air. it looked the shape of a garbage can. i observed this for several minutes when it travelled from above the powerline heading east. i watched this move from clouds behind it to blue skys. it moved east for several minutes , when as if a hole opened up in the sky and it started to disappear from right to left. it took about 10 to 15 seconds and it was gone. i observed this with my binoculars. the total distance it travelled was less than a mile before it disappeared.
content.summary: Watched the ufo travel east and disappeared in thin air

content.detailedDescription: I didn't want to walk up 5 flights of stairs to use the telephone in my apartment on w. 4th street at that time. i went to use the public telephone and i glanced to my left and saw this ufo hovering over the light pole on the corner of 6th ave. & w. 4th street.  the machine was not pretty it looked rather well used it was gray dull metal not mettalic it had lights all around what i could see of it, but they looked ordinary in their colors and they were not on.  i stared at the ufo unbelieving and looked around me to see who else was observing this phenomena and no one else around me was looking up. there were a couple of people walking toward the corner on both sides of the street but none of them noticed the ufo.  after a few seconds it started to go south against the traffic coming up 6th ave. and i didn't hear any horns blowing or any kind of recognition that anyone else saw this craft.  until recently i had no idea you existed until i saw you on tv.  i had purchased a non working 55 acrea farm  and was constantly looking up there to see a ufo.This was in the early 90's and i thought it extremely ironic that i would return to my apartment in manhattan and actually see one in the city.  has anyone else reported seeing this craft i don't remember the exact date.  it was still light out and the traffic up 6th ave was heavy so it was late afternoon.  not winter maybe fall.  as it slowly traveled south bound it started an upward incline.  nothing spectacular. i heard nothing from the craft and it didn't do anything extroidinary in movement and i wondered if it even was a ufo from another planet or one of ours but i had never seen anything like it before or after. i watched it until it got farther and farther away diminishing in size as it went.
content.summary: I was at the telephone booth on west 4th just easr of 6th ave. the ufo was hovering over the light fixture on the corner

content.detailedDescription: I was investigating a ufo hot spot with three other investigators and a witness to previous events at her home in independence, mo near the missouri river.  the location has been the site of an ongoing investigation with photos of unexplained objects, strange sparkles that fell from a ufo and affected vegitation, an et in the witness' bedroom, low flying craft, and unexplained objects observed by the investigators.We arrived at the home at approximately 8:00 p.M. to set up equipment and visit with the witness. we were hoping to get more evidence since the witness and her husband often see things at this location and our investigative team has also witnessed unexplained events there in the past. we all saw several strange unexplained things in the sky last night such as a bright white object which blinked on, then off, then on and off again, and a bright orange object with another smaller one next to it. at about 10:35 p.M. we all observed a single large white round object which flew very high at a high rate of speed from ne to e then blinked out. at about 10:40 p.M. i was sitting in a chair and another investigator stood to my right and back a couple of feet when i noticed what i thought was the investigator bending over very low - i saw what i thought was his head in my peripheral vision but when i turned to the right to see what he was doing it was actually an extraterrestrial standing there. he had no hair, tan skin, was approximately 3 1/2' tall, had a thin muscular body, thin mouth, small nose, not extremely large eyes, long face with pointed chin, and a head in proportion to the body or just slightly larger. he was either wearing a tight jumpsuit or no clothing. it shocked me, to say the least. i told everyone what i saw and grabbed my flir to check the area and check the ground for a heat signature left by the feet but there was nothing. i was again looking forward, when in my peripheral vision saw what i thought was the investigator moving forward. i looked to my right and there was the et again. he disappeared as soon as i looked straight at him. i then got the impression that the entity had been there all along and that he was observing us. we then all got our cameras and started taking pictures. a few minutes later i again saw what i thought was the investigator move forward and when i turned my head to look it was the entity, inches from my face, bent over slightly and he turned his head and stared right at me with a look on his face as if he were surprised that i could see him. i got out of the chair, put my hand out where i saw him, then walked through the area where he was standing and actually felt some type of energy go through me. i had the distinct impression that this entity was there to observe us all. i felt that this was important to report as the witness in this case since i was the only one who saw the entity.
content.summary: Observed a bright fast object and shortly after an extraterrestrial being standing right next to me

content.detailedDescription: Several instances of a light and buzzing getting louder and brighter until it seems i passed out. in some instances i remember a sense of being chased and then seeing the horizon and roof tops. then wakening and sitting up in my room confused of were i was staring out my window until i realized i was home.
content.summary: Able to observe details above roofline, never seen before

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my living room on my couch, when, all of a sudden i was awaken by my cat, sally. she appeared to be in a lot of pain, using her paws to cover up her ears, as if she heard a noise i didn't. i thought about it, and convinced my self to go outside and investigate, due to a light that lit up the entire inside of my living room. it wasn't a normal light though. almost like a laser beam, and orange and yellow one. once i went outside, to my backyard, i saw three triangular shaped objects that appeared to be observing the field behind my home. at this point they had not noticed me standing there. i decided to get a closer look. i walked to the edge of my property line; as soon as i got there, i heard a very very loud buzzing/ humming noise. all three of them took turns making the noise. they where in a triangle formation. the one to the left descended and hovered closer to me. the hover was very smooth, like there wasn't any resistance. once it got close to me (the size of my house) i was shocked. i could't believe what was happening. that was when the creek in between my backyard and the field began swooshing very hard. water flew in the air, towards the craft. the craft then disappeared. the two other crafts above did the same thing. went above the creek, and then disappeared. i was too scared to call the local authorities. i have heard what happens. about the men in black. i will never forget the day. i want to know what those crafts were and why they were behind my house, observing my field. and most of all, why did they disappear, and where to? i want an investigation. since then, i had purchased a gun. should i shoot at it? please advise...
content.summary: I was awaken by my cat, sally, going crazy covering her ears with her paws. i then saw a light through my window, went outside and observed.

content.detailedDescription:
Encounter deserted lake empty 2 lane highway 9pm no moon object was hovering stationary middle lake, then i was pursed from my observation point  approx 7 miles then experienced 48min lost time (happened near main western gate of yosimity park 1999. remember being handled but don't remember entities. dizzy after for 5 or 6 hours. motion sick 1 to 2 hours. depressed & somewhat afraid.

addional encounters:
(1) 1962; southern arizona posted gov reservation patagonia desert age 16 landed saucer shape w/entities @ approx 75'. pictures taken then conficated film & camera 2 med fbi id's. secretcy warned death threats given!
(2) 1965; near chulai, vietnam in combat zone after firefight paremiter. bright lites circular objects hovering (3) time lost 1.5 hours approx lost. objects gone w/me back in foxhole (usmc).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright  lite circular stionary hovering middle lake then directional to my stopped location then pursuing me over empty highway time lost  48min.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from class on roosevelt street by the smith & wesson factory in springfield,ma approaching the corner of roosevelt and bay street when i looked up and seen a chrome orb in the sky. it wasn't moving, floating or hovering meaning it was completely still or i couldn't see any movement from the distance i was at. it was lower than what a commercial plane would be maybe as high as what a single engine plane or a helicopter would fly at. i thought to myself "i'm having a ufo encounter right now". i tried to get as much detail as possible but i was also telling myself i must be crazy and kept walking like it was nothing. then i glanced back up maybe 30 seconds to 1 minute later and it was gone. then i knew i wasn't just seeing things. at this point (literally 1-2 mins since i first glanced up and seen the object) i was at the bottom of the hill and standing at the corner of roosevelt and bay street and i looked around in the sky for the object and spotted it off in the distant. i mean way off in the distance. it first looked like it was just over the corner of roosevelt and bay due south and now the object was miles in the distance. i only stopped looking at it and continued walking for 1 minute, say 5 minutes max if i'm exaggerating or miss remembering but for it to go from a few hundred feet from me to the distance i seen it at after i looked away was impossible for current aircraft and amazing. there was also a skyscraper(commercial plane) off in the distance to the sw. this gave me proof of it's distance and what i was seeing was not a plane. it was chrome, spherical but more egg shaped than perfectly round, it was large like a plane like hot air balloon size. i have better than 20/20 vision, i've always been told by friends i have excellent vision. i was not seeing things. i was not on drugs, drunk or in any way impaired. in short, i saw a floating chrome orb in the sky and it went from right above me to off miles in the distance (about as far as my eyes could see) within a matter of minutes. there was also a skyscraper traveling across the sky slowly which put the objects speed in perspective. it was sunny out with barely any clouds. **i am not saying i seen the object move it moved when i looked away for a couple minutes.** then when i looked up again it was gone and i looked sw and seen it far off, still hovering/floating/just sitting there. i did not see it in motion. 

also while i was writing this i just remembered....Weeks or months after my sighting i was riding in to work with a classmate and he seen the object too. this time i did not. we were about a quarter mile north on roosevelt turning onto cottage street while mid-conversation my classmate stopped talking and was looking in the sky to the north. i asked him what was wrong and he said nothing he saw something in the sky. i immediately though about my sighting and joked and said "what a ufo?" , he laughed and said "yes actually", i asked was it chrome and sphere shaped? he looked at me with a surprised look and said yes it was. this confirmed for me i wasn't crazy and what i saw that day was real. 

why this is classified as a ufo and strange for me:

1. it was just a chrome sphere but big like a hot air balloon just sitting in the sky. but there was no basket, no movement at all, and it looked metallic. 

2. how was it just sitting there? not floating, not hovering, completely still

3. how did it go from right above me couple hundred feet away and up in the sky to off in the distance as far as my eyes can see in a matter of a minute or minutes? a skyscraper traveling a few hundred miles per hours was also in the sky inching its way across the sky like a turtle. this thing went from point a to point b after looking away for a moment like it teleported or something. 

4. what i seen was weird and unexplained and completely a mystery to me.
content.summary: Chrome orb in the sky completely still/hovering. turned away for 1 min then observed impossibly far away

content.detailedDescription: The night of hailys comet several freinds and i was on my front poarch with all lights out with telescope to watch comet.The sky was lit up with stars and comet in sight. about 1am when all the sudden a huge 500 to 1000 foot craft slid quietly across sky streight over my house and blacked out the sky .It was so close i could have hit it with a rock .Everyone was completely shocked.It was so large it covered te entire valley headed tward the town of oak ridge.We could make out strutures petruding from the bottom .The color was black .The speed tarveling was slow mayby 20 mph when it passed over.It completly blacked out the sky it was so large.It didnt make a sound.Our jaws were on the ground no one made a sound.The craft was soundless it kept the same speed and elevation till it crosses another mountain out of view and sky is back in view. i have wanted to report this for years.My friends and i still talk about this event .There is no dought to me this was not of this world.
content.summary: The nite of hailys comet seen with several freinds in the sky rite above tree line complete silence sliding above trees so big it reached from hill behind house to hill in front of house .It totaly blacked out sky while we were watching comet

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday june 24th at approx 11:15 pm i was outside of my home stargazing.  i noticed something much bigger and brighter than the surrounding stars.  it was moving north at a speed much faster than any jet plane i have ever seen.  it then disappeared above the clouds and i then saw another bright light come out of the clouds moving at a slower speed then the first.  the 2nd one had a light that was blinking on and off underneath.  it looked like a panel of lights underneath.  when the light blinked off, it was completely dark, no other lights observed.    i watched this one for about 8 secs before it also disappeared into the clouds.  after about 10 mins later i noticed what looked like a military jet in the same vicinity as where the first light was observed but heading south.  the next night (june 25th) i went outside again to observe the sky at approx. 2:15 am.  within 15 mins i saw the same blinking light heading west.  i followed it for about 10 secs until it disappeared into the clouds.  i know what airplanes in the night sky look like and this was not an airplane.  airplanes also have red/green flashing lights.  this had a bright flashing panel of white light underneath it and it moved along with tremendous speed.
content.summary: Bright light in sky up near the stars.  about 6x larger and brighter than stars.  was moving way faster than a jet airplane. disappeared over cloud cover.
